name: Illuminati Adventure
description:
Welcome to your adventure to become a capitalist titan! Illuminati Adventure is the idle clicker game about evolving your business from scratch to make more money and rule the entire world. This idle Incremental game will show you how capitalist titans think and earn money.

Tap, tap to speed up your cash mining, buy and manage your business to make more cash. Get upgrades to earn even more money! Use prestige to unlock next careers or get access to shady business. Invest your cash strategically to accelerate your capitalists evolution. And remember... Illuminati is watching you...

There is some tips for PRO capitalists:
- tap on the "buy amount change" button to buy a lot of business in one tap (located in business UI label)
- your small business will evolve into big companies and factories of money after they pass right quantity mark (tap on business information to know if its worth the chase)
- sometimes birds appear on the sky, tap them to get free cash or diamonds
- purchasing "Lucky Ear" is the way to get idle diamonds income

If you like Idle games or Clicker games, you should definitely try this one. 

We plan to provide new updates and features such as skill system and new area to build your business. And we want our game to be also available on Apple Store. :) Thanks to your support we can do this much faster!

Note that Illuminati Adventure is a free game, but you can buy special items that requires real cash. Parental supervision is necessary if you're underage and want to buy something.
